exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="IndexSkin" width="2295" height="1300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="tree" width="1900" height="1300" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image id="leaf1" source="leaf1_png" x="54" y="0"/>
		<e:Image source="tree_png" x="0" y="260"/>
		<e:Image id="leaf2" source="leaf2_png" x="27" y="0"/>
		<e:Image id="leaf3" source="leaf3_png" x="282" y="0"/>
		<e:Image id="fly1" source="fly_png" x="712" y="709"/>
		<e:Image id="fly2" source="fly_png" x="927" y="845"/>
		<e:Image id="fly3" source="fly_png" x="736" y="879"/>
		<e:Image id="fly4" source="fly_png" x="1091" y="718"/>
		<e:Image id="fly5" source="fly_png" x="394" y="730"/>
		<e:Image id="fly6" source="fly_png" x="515" y="927"/>
		<e:Image id="fly7" source="fly_png" x="1173" y="1024"/>
		<e:Image id="fly8" source="fly_png" x="1361" y="767"/>
		<e:Image id="fly9" source="fly_png" x="1273" y="588"/>
		<e:Image id="fly10" source="fly_png" x="976" y="582"/>
		<e:Image id="fly11" source="fly_png" x="970" y="658"/>
		<e:Image id="fly12" source="fly_png" x="1176" y="764"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="panel_info" width="700" height="1300" x="1595" y="0">
		<e:Rect width="700" height="1300" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7" fillColor="0x001A21"/>
		<e:Image source="logo_png" y="50" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="panel_number_png" y="600" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="btn_start" source="btn_start_png" y="990" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="users" text="0" y="739" size="100" textColor="0xFFED00" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="panel_rank" width="700" height="1300" x="1595" y="0" visible="false">
		<e:Rect width="700" height="1300" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.7" fillColor="0x001A21" locked="true"/>
		<e:Image id="time_bg" source="panel_time_png" y="70" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="time" text="--" y="108" size="100" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0xFFED00"/>
		<e:Image id="btn_again" source="btn_again_png" y="103" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="rankSkin" width="700" height="90" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="avatar" width="66" height="66" x="152" verticalCenter="-1"/>
	<e:Image id="bgBar" x="80" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label id="rank" text="1" x="94" textColor="0x000000" verticalCenter="0" bold="true" size="50"/>
	<e:Label id="nickname" text="kaiser" x="240" verticalCenter="0" bold="true" size="30" textColor="0x000000"/>
	<e:Label id="score" text="0" x="495" bold="true" textColor="0xFFED00" size="40" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>
